Detailed Description

template<class T, class TIn>
class ZernikeDescriptor< T, TIn >

This class serves as a wrapper around the geometrical and Zernike moments. It provides also the implementation of invariant Zernike descriptors, means of reconstruction of orig. function, etc.

Parameters:

_order  the maximal order of the moments (N in paper)
